name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - Blast to the Past!
summary: "Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - Blast to the Past!" is an Overhaul mod for Security Breach that adds back content that was removed from the game, and adds new content into the game to provide players an all-new Security Breach experience, with areas yet to be seen, to new collectibles, new messages, mechanics old and new, all new looks to Freddy and the Gang, Blast to the Past! delivers what fans of series would like to see out of Security Breach! This mod isn't quite out of the oven yet, so stay tuned and have a Faz-errific day!
